description: From the tourism industry to software development, I combine strong interpersonal skills with a solid technical foundation. Working in English, Spanish, and French, I’ve honed my communication, empathy, and conflict-resolution abilities.

I’m currently focusing on Java, Spring Boot, and RESTful APIs, building maintainable, scalable, and secure backend systems while leveraging modern tools to optimize workflows and contribute effectively to high-impact projects.
